PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15742018-12-14,  INAC,  ,  , 
ActIndian Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Indian Band Election Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INDIAN BAND ELECTION REGULATIONS in order to amend the INDIAN BAND ELECTION REGULATIONS so the reporting requirement uses the same higher standard of evidence required by the INDIAN ACT to set aside an election where fraud or violations of the Regulations are found to have affected the outcome of the election.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0285 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
